summary: Email correspondence between Brad Edwards and an unnamed individual regarding the individual's urgent need for pro bono legal representation to file an objection in the Southern District of New York related to Epstein case matters. The individual expresses feeling traumatized and abandoned, while Edwards explains he cannot directly intervene due to a legal conflict but recommends attorney Steve Kelly.

persons.name: Brad Edwards
persons.context: Email sender who is being asked to intervene in finding pro bono legal representation for the recipient; explains he cannot speak directly to Steve Kelly on the recipient's behalf due to a legal conflict.

persons.name: Steve Kelly
persons.context: Attorney recommended by Brad Edwards to handle legal filing in Southern District of New York; described as reasonable and good but unlikely to work pro bono.

persons.name: Sigrid
persons.context: Person who previously attempted to find pro bono legal representation for the email recipient but failed to secure a lawyer who would respond.

connections.description: Edwards connected the email recipient to Kelly as a potential attorney, describing him as reasonable and good.
Sigrid attempted to find pro bono legal representation for the recipient but was unsuccessful.

events.title: Urgent request for pro bono legal help
events.description: Unnamed individual emails Brad Edwards seeking urgent pro bono legal representation to file an objection in Southern District of New York, expressing trauma and feeling abandoned.

keyFacts: An unnamed individual is urgently seeking pro bono legal representation to file an objection in the Southern District of New York regarding Epstein-related matters.
Brad Edwards cannot directly intervene or speak to attorney Steve Kelly on the individual's behalf due to a specific legal conflict.
The individual expresses being 'completely traumatised' and feeling 'very let down and abandoned by other parties' in relation to the legal process.
Sigrid previously attempted to find pro bono representation for the individual but the lawyer she contacted never responded.
Time is running out for the individual to file their objection, creating a sense of legal urgency.
